Liberate the Web/Projects

Defends your right to stay anonymous

Anonymous Handbook

anonhandbook.org

Awesome book in Russian language about cryptography and anonymity. Released under CC0.

How To Bypass Great Firewall of Russia

anonhandbook.org

Book in Russian about bypassing internet filters, such as Great Firewall of Russia. Released under CC0.

NoZapret.org

nozapret.org

Website about internet censorship in Russia.

NoZapret

nozapret.org/ext

Browser extension for Firefox and Chrome/Chromium, allow you to easy bypass Great Firewall of Russia.
